Action.author: odowdaibm
Action.body: Until this is upgraded to the new programming model it will not match documentation. 1.4 nd following documentation is for FabCar using the new programming model, so this will need to be updated as that becomes available.

Action.author: jtonline
Action.body: https://github.com/jt-nti/fabric-samples/tree/java-fabcar-chaincode/chaincode/fabcar/java New contract is here -> https://github.com/jt-nti/fabric-samples/tree/java-fabcar-contract/chaincode/fabcar/java (contract is still more of a work in progress and may sometimes depend on unmerged CRs at the moment) >
